DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare BIOTRONIK Orsiro Drug Eluting Stent System Abbott Xience Prime™ Drug Eluting Stent System respect in-stent Late Lumen Loss non-inferiority study de novo coronary lesion 9 month .
DOC.brief_title: Study Orsiro Drug Eluting Stent System
DOC.criteria: Main Subject provide write informed consent Single de novo lesion ≥ 50 % < 100 % stenosis 2 coronary artery The target lesion length ≤ 26 mm The target reference vessel diameter ≥ 2.25 mm ≤ 4.0 mm Main Evidence myocardial infarction within 72 hour prior index procedure Unprotected leave main coronary artery disease ( stenosis > 50 % ) Threevessel coronary artery disease time procedure Thrombus target vessel Target lesion involve side branch > 2.0 mm diameter Heavily calcify lesion Target lesion locate supplied arterial venous bypass graft
